verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Aleluya,hoye.
Tulitukuzeni jina la bwana*2
Hoyahe,hoyahe:

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Natufurahi siku ya leo*3
Tulitukuze jina la bwana.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
2.Mungu wetu ndiye baba mfariji
kazi zake zote zinakusifu

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
3.Tumshukuru kwa ajili ya Yesu.
Aliye nasi lake taifa.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
4.Tumpe Mungu sifa enzi tukuzo
nguvu na heshima hata milele.
